title: Main Log Response Ratio — .main_lnRR
text: Morris, W. F., Hufbauer, R. ., Agrawal, . ., Bever, J. D., Borowicz, V. ., Gilbert, G. S., ... & Vázquez, D. P. (2007). (2022). relative benefits environmental enrichment learning memory greater stressed: meta-analysis interactions rodents. what: Pooled Standard Deviation for SMD in factorial experiments — .pooled_sd
title: Pooled Standard Deviation for SMD in factorial experiments — .pooled_sd
text: Compute pooled standard deviation SMD. computes pooled SD 2 4 groups depending arguments passed. Simple SMD 2 groups, main interactions 4 groups.

title: Pooled Standard Deviation for SMD in factorial experiments — .pooled_sd
code: .pooled_sd(   Ctrl_sd,   Ctrl_n,   A_sd,   A_n,   B_sd = NULL,   B_n = NULL,   AB_n = NULL,   AB_sd = NULL )

title: Pooled Standard Deviation for SMD in factorial experiments — .pooled_sd
text: Ctrl_sd Standard deviation control treatment Ctrl_n Sample size control streatment A_sd Standard deviation treatment A_n Sample size treatment B_sd Standard deviation B treatment B_n Sample size B treatment AB_n Sample size interaction AxB treatment AB_sd Standard deviation interaction AxB treatment

title: Log Response Ratio (lnRR) — lnRR
text: Log Response Ratio (lnRR)

title: Log Response Ratio (lnRR) — lnRR
code: lnRR(   type,   data,   col_names = c("yi", "vi"),   append = TRUE,   Ctrl_mean,   Ctrl_sd,   Ctrl_n,   A_mean,   A_sd,   A_n,   B_mean = NULL,   B_sd = NULL,   B_n = NULL,   AB_mean = NULL,   AB_sd = NULL,   AB_n = NULL )

title: Log Response Ratio (lnRR) — lnRR
text: type Type effect size: "ind", "main", "inter" data Data frame data col_names Vector two strings name output columns effect size sampling variance. Default 'yi' 'vi'. append Logical. Append results data. Default TRUE Ctrl_mean Mean outcome Control treatment Ctrl_sd Standard deviation control treatment Ctrl_n Sample size control streatment A_mean Mean outcome treatment A_sd Standard deviation treatment A_n Sample size treatment B_mean Mean outcome B treatment B_sd Standard deviation B treatment B_n Sample size B treatment AB_mean Mean outcome interaction AxB treatment AB_sd Standard deviation interaction AxB treatment AB_n Sample size interaction AxB treatment

title: Log Response Ratio (lnRR) — lnRR

what: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
title: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
text: dataset contains fake data 2×2 factorial experiments four treatment groups: Control (C), Factor , Factor B, combination AB (B together). includes means, standard deviations, sample sizes group, well pre-computed effect sizes: log response ratio (lnRR), standardized mean difference (SMD), variances, main effects , B, interaction (AB).

title: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
text: data frame 10 rows 24 columns: C_n, C_mean, C_sd Sample size, mean, SD Control group A_n, A_mean, A_sd Sample size, mean, SD treatment B_n, B_mean, B_sd Sample size, mean, SD B treatment AB_n, AB_mean, AB_sd Sample size, mean, SD AB (B combined) treatment A_main_lnRR, A_main_lnRRv Log response ratio main effect variance B_main_lnRR, B_main_lnRRv Log response ratio main effect B variance AB_main_lnRR, AB_main_lnRRv Log response ratio AB interaction variance A_main_SMD, A_main_SMDv Standardized mean difference (Hedges' g) main effect variance B_main_SMD, B_main_SMDv Standardized mean difference main effect B variance AB_main_SMD, AB_main_SMDv Standardized mean difference AB interaction variance

title: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
